sn45.17:4.2: “Mendicants, these eight things don’t arise to be purified, bright, spotless, and rid of taints apart from the Holy One’s training.
sn45.17:4.5: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
